modName: Fighters of Skyrim - Vampire Diaries - Damon Salvatore and Salvatore Ring
summary: This mod replace an existing follower called Vorstag you can now recruit Damon Salvatore from the Vampire Diaries TV series. You can find him in the Silver Blood inn in Markart. And ad a new ring with a sun immunity. type help salvatore in the console command.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][font=Georgia][size=6]DESCRIPTION[/size][/font][/u][/b][/center]
This mod replace an existing follower called Vorstag you can now recruit Damon Salvatore from the Vampire Diaries TV Series. You can find him in the Silver Blood inn in Markart with a new ring with a sun immunity power like the ring of the salvatore's.

you can obtain this ring with the console command writing "Help Salvatore" without the quote
using: player.additem xxxxxxxxx 1

[size=4]This Mod Requires ApachiiSkyHair for men.[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/? ]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/? [/url]

[center][font=Georgia][size=6][u][b]Recommended
